aragorn.name: Aragorn
aragorn.ability: When heroes scout during the rally phase, you and nearby heroes each reveal 1 additional card.

arwen.name: Arwen
arwen.ability: Once during your turn, you or a nearby hero may flip 1 maxDamage or maxFear facedown, or discard 1 facedown maxDamage or maxFear.

balin.name: Balin
balin.ability: Once per round, when you suffer maxDamage, after resolving all maxDamage from a single source, you may prepare 1 skill from your discard pile.

beorn.name: Beorn
beorn.ability: Before you interact, if there are no nearby heroes, you may scout 1.

beravor.name: Beravor
beravor.ability: Once per round, after you sprint, hide, or strike, you may scout 1.

bilbo.name: Bilbo
bilbo.ability:
Before you interact, look at the top card of your deck. If it is a card with a Fate, gain 1 maxInspiration.
You can equip only one hand.

boromir.name: Boromir
boromir.ability:
When you perform a last stand test, you may suffer 1 maxDamage or maxFear to add 1 success to that test.
(Limit once per test.)

calaminthTook.name: Calaminth Took
calaminthTook.ability:
After you prepare an aid, food, or valour skill, you or a nearby hero may gain 1 maxInspiration.
You can equip only 1 hand.

dis.name: Dis
dis.ability: After you test, you may spend 1 fate icon to place 1 card from the test on top of your deck.

dwalin.name: Dwalin
dwalin.ability:
After you interact, you may spend 1 maxInspiration to prepare 1 card from your discard pile.
(Limit once per interact.)

eleanor.name: Eleanor
eleanor.ability: Once per phase, a hero in your space may spend 1 maxInspiration to convert 2 fate to 2 success.

elena.name: Elena
elena.ability: Once per test, after you spend 1 maxInspiration, a nearby hero gains 1 maxInspiration.

freahild.name: Fréahild
freahild.ability: During setup, you may equip the "Snowbright" mount instead of any other mount.  You can equip 1 one-handed item and 1 two-handed item.

gandalf.name: Gandalf
gandalf.ability: Once per round, after you discard a prepared skill with fate, you may gain 1 maxInspiration and scout 1.

gimli.name: Gimli
gimli.ability: After you attack, you may place 1 card from the test on top of your deck.

theGreatBear.name: The Great Bear
theGreatBear.ability:
Before you interact, as an additional cost, choose and discard 1 prepared skill.
(You can only equip Rending Claws and Hoary Coat.)

legolas.name: Legolas
legolas.ability: Once per round, during your turn, you may spend 1 maxInspiration to move 1 space without provoking attacks.

renerien.name: Rénëríen
renerien.ability: Action: Scout 2.  If you prepare a card with success, discard 1 facedown maxDamage or maxFear.  If you prepare a card with a fate, gain 1 maxInspiration.
